name: Kinetic Dampening Mantle
description: A shimmering, interwoven mesh of carbon nanotubes and piezoelectric fibers woven into a cloak. It absorbs kinetic energy from impacts, dispersing it harmlessly through its intricate structure.

flavor.rationale: This armor was developed by the Black Lotus Syndicate for their elite strike teams to allow them to survive high-speed crashes during escapes or ambushes while still maintaining full mobility.
